column5: My place is close to the beach, Schlitterbahn , great fishing, Mustang Island State Park, Padre Island National Seashore, restaurants and shopping!. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the view is amazing, the beach and Packery Lake from the patio. Walk down to the beach and jump in our heated pool.. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
